modShortDescription: This 7 Days to Die mod increases the XP needed to level from 10000 to 12454 in order to extend leveling time slightly.
modDescription:
This 7 Days to Die mod increases the [XP](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-experience/) needed to level from 10000 to 12454 in order to extend leveling time slightly. Be advised that adding and removing this mod may cause a character wipe since it deals with progression. **Use this on a new save and don’t remove once your game is started with it.**

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/JaxTeller718/A19ModletsJax/tree/a19b168/JaxTeller718_SlowerProgression)** for A19  
**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/JaxTeller718/JaxTeller718_Modlets_Stable/tree/master/JaxTeller718_SlowerProgression)** for A18

If you appreciate JaxTeller718’s work here feel free to use this [donate link](https://www.paypal.me/FrankCirabisiJr) to show support.

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/19674-jaxteller718-a19-modlet-collection/).

**Credits:** [JaxTeller718](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/jaxteller718/)
